author: Jonathan Chait
title: The Coronavirus and Conservatism’s War on Science
description: Richard Epstein isn’t the only right-winger to dismiss epidemiology.
content: Throughout the coronavirus pandemic, President Trump spent weeks in denial, snapped suddenly into taking the threat seriously, reverted to denialism, and has, for the moment, toggled back to serious concern. In his Sunday press conference, Trump cited his pub… [+6156 chars]
